price: Ọjọ́ tí dúkìá kan tàbí àwọn ọmọ kò níí ṣàǹfààní.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٞ وَلَا بَنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yanfaʿu mālun walā banūna
